bibl.title: Bounties of Egyptian Inland Waters. A Few Comments on Fish in Dietetics and Egyptian Cuisine Contained in the Collectiones medicae of Oribasius.
bibl.note: An appendix to: M.S.A. MIKHAIL, Some Observations Concerning Edibles in Late Antique and Early Islamic Egypt, Volume offert au Professeur Justin Mossay = Byzantion 70 (2000) pp. 105-121.
